reviews.text: Texas Direct Roofing & Construction 4897 State Hwy 121 #260, The Colony, TX 75056 A chimney leak is serious business, but Texas homeowners experience chimney leaks more often than we'd like. That's why we created this short, top-down guide to diagnosing a chimney leak before you give us a call.
